title: Is it true that PESU refunds 40% of the fees if you maintain a good CGPA?
content: I might be joining PES this year and one of my friends said that PESU refunds 40% of the fees to any student who maintains a CGPA of 8.5 every year, even for management quota students. Is this true? Even if the refunding thing is true, are the numbers correct?

comments.body: usually 8.8+ for 40% and 9.4+ for 50% refund, for all students, PESSAT/JEE, KCET, MGMT!
depends on campus... ec campus 8.5 and rr campus 8.8 in the first year

You'll definitely have to have a GPA above 8.5 to avail that scholarship; however, you must also be in the top 25%.  
Top 5% (depends on CGPA) get a 50% scholarship,  and the next 20% (based on SGPA) get a 40% scholarship
There are scholarships available for those who secure a min gpa, that decrease fees
Is it only in PESU or other colleges like RVCE offer these Scholarship??
Idt rvce has anything like this
U have to be in top 25% and above 8.5 minimum
Top 25% of your branch or among all branches?

Top 25% of ur branch in ur campus 
Like ece students in ecc have one pool whole ece students in rr have their own
